column1: Art Institute of Chicago////A wonderful art installation featuring some of the world's best art. I really enjoyed all aspects of the Institute
column3: Marc Chagall windows and impressionist wing. The layout flows nicely and it isn't hard to follow. There is a lot of help throughout the Institute for directions. One of the nice things was that they allowed you to take pictures (no flash) of the art
column4: which allowed me to document my favorites. Please know that Wifi isn't easily available throughout the Institute
column5: so using an IPAD would be considered somewhat challenged.
